guest.name: Shreyas Doshi
guest.title: Founder & Product Coach
guest.company: Shreyas Doshi, LLC (Formerly Stripe, Twitter, Google)
guest.background: Shreyas is a former product leader at Stripe, Twitter, Google, and Yahoo, widely recognized for his insights on product leadership and career psychology. He now focuses on coaching elite product leaders and creating high-value content for the product community.
guest.background_zh: Shreyas 曾任 Stripe、Twitter、Google 和 Yahoo 的产品负责人，以其对产品领导力和职场心理学的深刻洞察而闻名。他目前专注于辅导顶尖产品领袖，并为产品社区持续输出高价值的深度内容。

episodeSummary: Recorded live in San Francisco, Shreyas Doshi shares the three critical questions he wishes he had asked himself earlier in his career to avoid unnecessary suffering. The conversation dissects why product leaders are perpetually busy due to scope creep, the importance of developing 'good taste' beyond just design, and how to align your career with your natural superpowers to prevent burnout.
episodeSummary_zh: 本期节目于旧金山现场录制，Shreyas Doshi 分享了他希望在职业生涯早期就能自问的三个关键问题，以避免无谓的职场痛苦。对话深度剖析了产品领导者因职责范围蔓延而陷入忙碌怪圈的原因，探讨了超越设计层面的“好品味”的重要性，以及如何将职业发展与个人天赋（Superpowers）对齐以避免职业倦怠。
